A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the movie was fantastic! It came from a totally different perspective than any other Star Wars movie in existence. It is definitely one of the most important movies of the franchise. TLJ provides a place for children and a younger generation to look up to people that respect and care for one another even though they disagree\, which is something that can arguably be a big problem in today's society. I loved TLJ and definitely understand how the new generation of Star Wars fans could love and do need this movie.
